About me

At Deutsche Bank, our team has used React, TypeScript, GraphQL and Redux to drive the development of a next-generation platform for onboarding investment banking clients using. By implementing modern functional React patterns, optimizing Webpack and Babel for faster load times, and leveraging AI tools like GitHub CoPilot, we‚Äôve accelerated development cycles and enhanced user experiences. Migrating Kubernetes microservices and CI/CD pipelines to Google Cloud has positioned the platform for scalability and innovation.

When I‚Äôm not writing code, I‚Äôm a bar trivia champion, hot sauce daredevil and kombucha home brewer. I‚Äôll talk your ear off about reverse searing steaks, the best way to make a martini (obviously gin, almost no vermouth) and the uselessness of the Oxford comma.

My experience

Senior Technical Lead

Deutsche Bank / HCLTech

Overhauling legacy code bases to use modern, maintainable tools and technologies. Implementing micro-frontend architecture to refactor monolithic apps into modular services, enabling CI/CD by multiple scrum teams working in multiple languages and frameworks.

2024

Software Engineer

xkite

Built an open source GUI for Apache Kafka prototyping, testing and deployment with a team of five engineers. xkite lets developers spin up containerized Kafka clusters in minutes, run custom tests, and export their setup for deployment.

2023

Senior Communications Consultant

Wake County & Town of Clayton

Built and maintained websites for two local governments, including N.C.'s largest county. Administered 60+ social media accounts. Wrote and edited news releases, newsletters, speeches, and more.

2015 - 2022
